    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet PriceModifiers_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:PriceModifiers_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PriceModifiers xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">
    <Promotion code="Example String Value" name="Example String Value" promotionVendorCode="Example String Value Example String Value Example String Value">Example String Value</Promotion>
    <RateQualifier code="Example String Value" description="Example String Value" rateAuthorizationCode="Example String Value" rateID="Example String Value" ratePeriod="Hourly">Example String Value</RateQualifier>
    <ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier objID="person_1">
        <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
        <ota2-0400:OtherID organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</ota2-0400:OtherID>
        <ota2-0400:PersonRef>person_1</ota2-0400:PersonRef>
    </ota2-0400:PersonIdentifier>
    <ProductRef>a111</ProductRef>
</PriceModifiers>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PriceModifiers" : {
    "Promotion" : [ {
      "value" : "Example String Value",
      "promotionVendorCode" : [ "Example", "String", "Value", "Example", "String", "Value", "Example", "String", "Value" ],
      "code" : "Example String Value",
      "name" : "Example String Value"
    } ],
    "RateQualifier" : [ {
      "value" : "Example String Value",
      "code" : "Example String Value",
      "rateAuthorizationCode" : "Example String Value",
      "rateID" : "Example String Value",
      "ratePeriod" : "Hourly",
      "description" : "Example String Value"
    } ],
    "PersonIdentifier" : [ {
      "objID" : "person_1",
      "Identifier" : {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      },
      "OtherID" : [ {
        "value" : "guid12345",
        "url" : "http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00",
        "system" : "sysABC3344",
        "organization" : "Acme"
      } ],
      "PersonRef" : "person_1"
    } ],
    "ProductRef" : "a111"
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Promotion
        A promotion that applies to the price calculation.
        Details
        Type Promotion
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        RateQualifier
        Discounts and other rate qualifiers such as a senior rate, sunset rate, military rate, etc.
        Details
        Type RateQualifier
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        PersonIdentifier
        An identifier for the person to which the promotion or discount applies.
        Details
        Type Person_ID
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 99
        ProductRef
        A reference to the product for which the rate modifier applies.
        Details
        Type Product
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
